questions.question: What type of rock is obsidian?
What elements are obsidian rich in?
questions.correct_answer: Obsidian is rich in silicon, oxygen, aluminium, sodium, and potassium.

questions.question: Why does obsidian form as a natural glass instead of mineral crystals?
questions.correct_answer: Obsidian forms as a natural glass because its high viscosity inhibits the diffusion of atoms through the lava, preventing nucleation, along with rapid cooling.
